messages.body: We need a big order but can't take everything at once. Coffee, tea, paper, balloons.
We can split into multiple shipments. Quantities and how you want to split?
12 bags coffee, 30 boxes tea, 50 reams paper, 4000 balloons. Three shipments if possible.
Pricing: coffee $25/bag, tea $12/box, paper $4/ream, balloons $3000/1000. Total 300+360+200+12000 = $12,860. How to split?
First shipment: coffee only, Nov 28. Second: tea and paper, Dec 5. Third: balloons, Dec 12.
Addresses? Same for all three?
First two to 100 Finance Ave. Third to Changi Hospital Wars 24 Singapore 700339 — event site.
Actually can we do coffee and tea in the first shipment, then paper, then balloons? We need tea earlier.
So shipment 1: 12 coffee + 30 tea, Nov 28. Shipment 2: 50 paper, Dec 5. Shipment 3: 4000 balloons, Dec 12.
Yes. Same addresses — Finance Ave for 1 and 2, Changi for 3.
Noted. Any discount discussion? Order value is high.
We want 4% off. We had a problem last time with a multi-shipment order — second delivery was short one box of tea.
I recall we made good on that. For this order we can do 3% — $12,474.20. 4% I'd need to confirm.
We're committing to three dates. We want 4%.
We can do 4% if you confirm all three dates and give at least 5 business days' notice for any change. $12,345.60.
Accepted. PO-2024-11-602. Net 30 from last delivery — Dec 12.
Wait — we might need to cancel the balloon shipment. The event could be postponed. Can we lock coffee, tea, paper and leave balloons tentative?
We can do shipment 1 and 2 confirmed, shipment 3 (balloons) as provisional. You'd need to confirm or cancel by Dec 5.
Okay. Confirm shipment 1 and 2. We'll advise on balloons by Dec 5.
So SO will show three DOs; the third is conditional. If you cancel balloons we'll issue a revised SO for the first two only.
What if we move the balloon date to Dec 19 instead of 12?
We can do Dec 19. I'll put Dec 19 on the third DO and you can still confirm or cancel by Dec 5.
Keep Dec 12 for now. We'll let you know.
Dec 12 for shipment 3. Receiving contacts?
Finance Ave +65 9123 4567. Changi +65 8765 4321, ask for Stores.
Last September you short-delivered tea on the second run. How do we avoid that again?
We've added a second verification step on multi-shipment orders. Each DO is picked and checked separately.
Good. We need batch numbers on packing lists for coffee and tea.
We'll include batch and expiry on the packing lists for shipments 1 and 2.
Invoice after the last delivery, one invoice for everything, itemised?
Yes. One invoice after Dec 12 with all lines and DO references.
If we cancel the balloons, will the 4% still apply to the remaining amount?
If you cancel shipment 3 the order value drops. We'd recalc — likely 3% on the coffee/tea/paper total. We'll confirm at the time.
Understood. We're hoping the event goes ahead so we'll keep balloons for now.
SO-2024-1302 with three DOs. I'll send shortly. Confirm when received.
Can we shift shipment 2 from Dec 5 to Dec 6? Just one day.
We need 5 business days' notice for date changes or there may be a rehandling fee. If you confirm now we can set Dec 6.
Keep Dec 5. Don't want to risk a fee.
Dec 5 it is.
We're planning something similar for Q1 — maybe four shipments. Would the same 4% logic apply?
If you share a draft schedule and volumes we can confirm terms. Multi-shipment orders above a threshold typically get the same treatment.
We'll send something by mid-December. Thanks.
You're welcome. We'll send separate delivery reminders 48 hours before each date.
One more thing — if the event is cancelled and we drop balloons, do we need to send a new PO or is an email enough?
Email confirmation is enough. We'll adjust the SO and invoice accordingly.
If we add a fourth shipment — say just paper again for Dec 19 — would that be a new PO or an amendment?
We'd treat it as an amendment or a new DO under the same SO if the value is similar. Easier to amend if it's one more date.
We're not adding it. Just asking for planning.
Shipment 1 — is it one pallet or multiple for the coffee and tea?
12 bags coffee and 30 boxes tea will go on two pallets. We'll send the pallet count on the packing list.
Our dock can take two. If it were three we'd need to schedule.
Two pallets for shipment 1. Noted.
Balloons — if we reduce from 4000 to 2000, does the price per 1000 change?
Same $3000 per 1000. So 2000 would be $6000. The 4% would apply to whatever the final order value is.
We'll keep 4000 for now. Event team is still confirming.
Last time the Changi delivery was in the afternoon. Can we get morning for the balloons?
We'll request morning slot for DO-3. Can't guarantee but we'll try.
Thanks. They need to set up the venue in the afternoon.
Understood.
Who do we contact if there's an issue on the day — same number as order placement?
Yes. Or the number on the delivery note. We'll include a contact for day-of issues.
Good. We'll wait for the SO and the three DOs.
Can shipment 2 include a few boxes of tea for our other site? Same PO or separate?
We could add tea to shipment 2 and ship to a second address with a split. We'd need the second address and quantity.
Forget it — we'll order for the other site separately next month.
Understood.
What's the latest we can confirm or cancel the balloon shipment without any charge?
By Dec 5 close of business. After that we may have already allocated stock and there could be a restock fee.
We'll decide by Dec 4. Thanks.
